Symbol.Script_3D:
! Contact person: <SzL, NJ>
! =============================================================================
lod3D = 0 ! Don't draw anything if iDWDet3D = DETLEVEL_DW3D_SIMPLE then lod3D = 1 ! Simple if iDWDet3D = DETLEVEL_DW3D_DETAILED then lod3D = 2 ! Detailed if iDWDet3D = DETLEVEL_DW3D_CHI_SIMPLE | iDWDet3D = DETLEVEL_DW3D_CHI_DETAILED then if (GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 | GLOB_CONTEXT = 24 | GLOB_CONTEXT = 6) then lod3D = 5 ! Chinese else lod3D = 2 endif endif
if not(gs_shadow) then shadow off
if h < B - A/2 then h = B - A/2 if h > B then h = B - 0.02
! ============================================================================= ! GS Window Opening Functions ! =============================================================================
call "GS Window Opening Functions", parameters all iWindowShape = iWindowShape, openingArchHeight = openingArchHeight, nArchResolution = gs_res, gs_IsCurved = 0, bParalellInCurvedWalls = bParalellInCurvedWalls, lod3D = lod3D, ac_wallhole_height = B, ac_reveal_height = B
! ============================================================================= ! Preview in Object Settings Dialog ! =============================================================================
pen WALL_VIEW_PEN resol gs_res
if GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE # 0 | GLOB_FEEDBACK_MODE then
bFullArc = (abs(A/2 - B + gs_shoulder_height) < EPS)
openingArchHeight = b-gs_shoulder_height rr = (openingArchHeight^2 + (a/2)^2) / 2 / openingArchHeight
if not(WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE) then addz -WIDO_SILL else addz WIDO_SILL - WALL_THICKNESS + WIDO_FRAME_THICKNESS endif
if GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE = 1 | GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE = 3 then put A/2 + 0.2, -0.2, 8, A/2 + 0.2, B + 0.2, 8, -A/2 - 0.2, B + 0.2, 8, -A/2 - 0.2, -0.2, 8, A/2 + 0.2, -0.2, -1 endif
if GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE = 2 then put -A/2, 0, 0, A/2, 0, 0, A/2, gs_shoulder_height-eps, bFullArc, A/2, gs_shoulder_height, 1, 1/tan(90+acs(a/2/rr)), 1, 800, 0, b, 1001, -1, 0, 800, -A/2, gs_shoulder_height, 1000 + bFullArc, -A/2, 0, -1
extrude nsp/3, 0, 0, WALL_THICKNESS, 16+32, get(nsp) else put -A/2, 0, 15, A/2, 0, 15, A/2, gs_shoulder_height-eps, 13 + not(bFullArc) * 2, A/2, gs_shoulder_height, 13, 1/tan(90+acs(a/2/rr)), 1, 800, 0, b, 1079, -1, 0, 800, -A/2, gs_shoulder_height, 1013 + not(bFullArc) * 2, -A/2, 0, -1
cprism_ WALL_MAT_A, WALL_MAT_B, WALL_MAT_EDGE, nsp/3, WALL_THICKNESS, get(nsp) endif del 1 if GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE # 0 then end endif
! ============================================================================= ! Hotspot editing ! =============================================================================
curvedWall = abs(WIDO_ORIG_DIST) > EPS
if not(curvedWall) then del top if WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then addz WIDO_FRAME_THICKNESS else mulz -1 endif addz WIDO_SILL
unID = 1
hotspot A/2, 0, 0, unID, gs_shoulder_height, 1+128: unID=unID+1 hotspot A/2, -1, 0, unID, gs_shoulder_height, 3: unID=unID+1 hotspot A/2, gs_shoulder_height, 0, unID, gs_shoulder_height, 2: unID=unID+1
hotspot -A/2, 0, 0, unID, gs_shoulder_height, 1+128: unID=unID+1 hotspot -A/2, -1, 0, unID, gs_shoulder_height, 3: unID=unID+1 hotspot -A/2, gs_shoulder_height, 0, unID, gs_shoulder_height, 2: unID=unID+1
hotspot A/2, 0, -WALL_THICKNESS, unID, gs_shoulder_height, 1+128: unID=unID+1 hotspot A/2, -1, -WALL_THICKNESS, unID, gs_shoulder_height, 3: unID=unID+1 hotspot A/2, gs_shoulder_height, -WALL_THICKNESS, unID, gs_shoulder_height, 2: unID=unID+1
hotspot -A/2, 0, -WALL_THICKNESS, unID, gs_shoulder_height, 1+128: unID=unID+1 hotspot -A/2, -1, -WALL_THICKNESS, unID, gs_shoulder_height, 3: unID=unID+1 hotspot -A/2, gs_shoulder_height, -WALL_THICKNESS, unID, gs_shoulder_height, 2: unID=unID+1
del 2 endif
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Contact person: <SzL, NJ>
! ============================================================================= ! GS Window Opening Functions ! =============================================================================
call "GS Window Opening Functions", parameters all iWindowShape = iWindowShape, bParalellInCurvedWalls = bParalellInCurvedWalls
Symbol.Script_1D:
! const values for parameter: iTypeCurvedWallCut CUT_PARALLEL = 1 CUT_RADIAL = 2
! const values for parameter: iDWDet3D DETLEVEL_DW3D_SCALESENS = 1 DETLEVEL_DW3D_DETAILED = 2 DETLEVEL_DW3D_SIMPLE = 3 DETLEVEL_DW3D_OFF = 4 DETLEVEL_DW3D_CHI_SIMPLE = 5 DETLEVEL_DW3D_CHI_DETAILED = 6
! Contact person: <SzL, NJ>
if GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE = 7 | GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE = 8 then goto "MasterEnd" ! forward migration, backward migration
! ============================================================================= ! Main Definitions ! =============================================================================
EPS = 0.0001
iWindowShape = 1 ! SHAPE_ARCHED bParalellInCurvedWalls = (iTypeCurvedWallCut = CUT_PARALLEL)
h = gs_shoulder_height
! ============================================================================= ! Localization ! =============================================================================
dim stDetail[6] stDetail[1] = `Зависит от Масштаба` stDetail[2] = `Детальный` stDetail[3] = `Простой` stDetail[4] = `Откл.` stDetail[5] = `Китайский Простой` stDetail[6] = `Китайский Детальный`
"MasterEnd":
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Contact person: <SzL, NJ>
! ============================================================================= ! GS Window Opening Functions ! =============================================================================
call "GS Window Opening Functions", parameters all iWindowShape = iWindowShape, bParalellInCurvedWalls = bParalellInCurvedWalls, ac_reveal_height = B
! ============================================================================= ! Orientation ! =============================================================================
ac_OpeningSide = "" parameters ac_OpeningSide = ac_OpeningSide
! ============================================================================= ! IFC Parameters ! =============================================================================
ifc_optype = 10 ! WIN_OP_USER_DEFINED parameters ifc_optype = ifc_optype call "IFC_optype_window" parameters ifc_optype = ifc_optype
lock "ifc_optypestr"
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "openingArchHeight" | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "B" then gs_shoulder_height = B - openingArchHeight parameters gs_shoulder_height = B - openingArchHeight endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_shoulder_height" then openingArchHeight = B - gs_shoulder_height parameters openingArchHeight = B - gs_shoulder_height endif
values "A" range (0, ) values "B" range (gs_shoulder_height, ) values "gs_shoulder_height" range [B - A/2,) values "openingArchHeight" range (0, A/2]
values{2} "iTypeCurvedWallCut" CUT_PARALLEL, `Параллельно`, CUT_RADIAL, `Радиально` values "gs_res" range[3,) values "gs_frame_thk" range[0,]
if gs_pen_2D <= 0 then parameters gs_pen_2D = 3
! Wall Contour Left/Right --------------------------------------------------------------
gs_stack_right = not(gs_stack_right_contour) parameters gs_stack_right = not(gs_stack_right_contour)
gs_stack_left = not(gs_stack_left_contour) parameters gs_stack_left = not(gs_stack_left_contour)
! ============================================================================= ! 3D Detail Level ! =============================================================================
if gs_3DDetEnable =0 then
values{2} "iDWDet3D" DETLEVEL_DW3D_DETAILED, `Детальный`, DETLEVEL_DW3D_SIMPLE, `Простой`, DETLEVEL_DW3D_OFF, `Откл.`
else dim n3DScaleValueMask[] dim n3DScaleValueMask_m[]
i=1 if bittest( gs_3DDetEnable, 0) then ! Scale Sensitive in Value list, 1 n3DScaleValueMask[i] = stDetail[1] n3DScaleValueMask_m[i] = DETLEVEL_DW3D_SCALESENS i = i + 1 endif if bittest( gs_3DDetEnable, 1) then ! Detailed in Value list,2 n3DScaleValueMask[i] = stDetail[2] n3DScaleValueMask_m[i] = DETLEVEL_DW3D_DETAILED i = i + 1 endif if bittest( gs_3DDetEnable, 2) then ! Simple in Value list,4 n3DScaleValueMask[i] = stDetail[3] n3DScaleValueMask_m[i] = DETLEVEL_DW3D_SIMPLE i = i + 1 endif if bittest( gs_3DDetEnable, 3) then ! Off in Value list,8 n3DScaleValueMask[i] = stDetail[4] n3DScaleValueMask_m[i] = DETLEVEL_DW3D_OFF i = i + 1 endif if bittest( gs_3DDetEnable, 4) then ! Chinese Simple in Value list,16 n3DScaleValueMask[i] = stDetail[5] n3DScaleValueMask_m[i] = DETLEVEL_DW3D_CHI_SIMPLE i = i + 1 endif if bittest( gs_3DDetEnable, 5) then ! Chinese Detailed in Value list,32 n3DScaleValueMask[i] = stDetail[6] n3DScaleValueMask_m[i] = DETLEVEL_DW3D_CHI_DETAILED i = i + 1 endif
values{2} "iDWDet3D" n3DScaleValueMask_m, n3DScaleValueMask endif
!**************** Swedish list parameter control ********************** if gs_SWE_listParams_contr > 0 then call "SWE_ListParameters_control" parameters gs_SWE_listParams_contr = gs_SWE_listParams_contr, swe_list_f1 = swe_list_f1 endif

Boolean.Name: AC_HoleMaterialCurved
Boolean.Description: "Стык Покрытий в Проеме Искривлен в Криволинейных Стенах"

Symbol.Script_UI: call "GS Window Opening Functions", parameters all iWindowShape = iWindowShape, gs_res = gs_res, gs_shoulder_height = gs_shoulder_height
Symbol.Keywords: Пустой проем, арка, отлив, доска, наличник, ставни, четверть, декоративная перемычка, подоконная ниша, замыкание слоев
Symbol.Script_FWM:
actualGUID = FROM_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
_autoID = "1286C53E-14C7-48F7-9783-276C9EE1BA50" _startID = "74752AA2-9756-4E35-9AB0-10B78C3A8EC3" _endID = "0470307E-670D-4573-98AF-8323E928A6ED" gosub "B406_NewFuctionsCommon_FWM"
_startID = "0470307E-670D-4573-98AF-8323E928A6ED" _endID = "A3C2661E-1FC4-4370-A583-FB938F179711" gosub "NewSillTypes_FWM"
_startID = "A3C2661E-1FC4-4370-A583-FB938F179711" _endID = "7A6A2C6B-D324-4CF2-BC07-D423A9F1B4A0" gosub "NewDemolitionSymbol_FWM"
_startID = "7A6A2C6B-D324-4CF2-BC07-D423A9F1B4A0" _endID = "AC354817-BB23-4E88-8D11-506A8AFA83BA" gosub "deleteUnusedListParams_FWM"
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid actualGUID
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! B406_NewFuctionsCommon ! ============================================================================== "B406_NewFuctionsCommon_FWM": if actualGuid = _startID | actualGuid = _autoID then bMigrationSuccess = 1 call "Migration_DoorWindow" parameters all iMigrationStep = 1, bMigrateDoorLeaf = 0, bMigrateDoorHandle = 0, bMigrateKickBoard = 0, bMigrateKickBoard2 = 0, bMigrateCasingType = 0, bMigrateBottomCasing = 1, bMigrateCasingCover = 1, returned_parameters bMigrationSuccess
if bMigrationSuccess then actualGUID = _endID else actualGuid = "" endif endif return
! ============================================================================== ! NewSillTypes ! ============================================================================== "NewSillTypes_FWM": if actualGuid = _startID then actualGUID = _endID endif return
! ============================================================================== ! NewDemolitionSymbol ! ============================================================================== "NewDemolitionSymbol_FWM": if actualGuid = _startID then iTypeDemolitionFill = 1 ! RENOVATION_FILL_EXIST parameters iTypeDemolitionFill = iTypeDemolitionFill
actualGUID = _endID endif return
! ============================================================================== ! deleteUnusedListParams ! ============================================================================== "deleteUnusedListParams_FWM": if actualGUID = _startID then _customList1 = "" _customList2 = "" _customList3 = "" _customList4 = "" _customList5 = ""
bDeleted = DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_list_custom1", _customList1) & \ DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_list_custom2", _customList2) & \ DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_list_custom3", _customList3) & \ DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_list_custom4", _customList4) & \ DELETED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_list_custom5", _customList5)
if _customList1 <> "" | \ _customList2 <> "" | \ _customList3 <> "" | \ _customList4 <> "" | \ _customList5 <> "" then
actualGUID = "" else actualGUID = _endID endif endif return
Symbol.Script_BWM:
targetGUID = TO_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
gosub "deleteUnusedListParams_BWM"
gosub "NewDemolitionSymbol_BWM"
gosub "NewSillTypes_BWM"
gosub "B406_NewFuctionsCommon_BWM"
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid targetGuid
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! deleteUnusedListParams ! ============================================================================== "deleteUnusedListParams_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then ! Empty Step migrate backward every case endif return
! ============================================================================== ! NewDemolitionSymbol ! ============================================================================== "NewDemolitionSymbol_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then if (iTypeDemolitionFill <> 1) then ! not RENOVATION_FILL_EXIST targetGUID = "" endif endif return
! ============================================================================== ! NewSillTypes ! ============================================================================== "NewSillTypes_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then if gs_sill_outside & (iSillType = 17) then ! SILL_DUTCH targetGUID = "" endif endif return
! ============================================================================== ! B406_NewFuctionsCommon ! ============================================================================== "B406_NewFuctionsCommon_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then bMigrationSuccess = 1 call "Migration_DoorWindow" parameters all iMigrationStep = 1, bMigrateDoorLeaf = 0, bMigrateDoorHandle = 0, bMigrateKickBoard = 0, bMigrateKickBoard2 = 0, bMigrateCasingType = 0, bMigrateBottomCasing = 1, bMigrateCasingCover = 1, returned_parameters bMigrationSuccess
if not(bMigrationSuccess) then targetGUID = "" endif endif return
